previewArticle.title: Sporting Kansas City vs. Toronto FC | MLS Match Preview

recapArticle.title: Sporting Kansas City 2, Toronto FC 2 | MLS Match Recap

timelineItems.desc: An intriguing matchup of Eastern Conference sides kicks off the MLS weekend as Sporting Kansas City play host to Toronto FC on Friday evening at Sporting Park.
timelineItems.title: KICKOFF: Sporting Kansas City vs Toronto FC | May 23, 2014

timelineItems.comment: First Half begins.

timelineItems.name: Matt Russell
timelineItems.text: This summer Chance Myers is: the Sixth CB. #sportingkc #SKCvTOR

timelineItems.comment: Toni (Sporting Kansas City) wins a free kick in the defensive half.
Foul by Collen Warner (Toronto FC).
Foul by Dominic Dwyer (Sporting Kansas City).
Nick Hagglund (Toronto FC) wins a free kick in the defensive half.

timelineItems.name: Andy Edwards
timelineItems.text: The #TFC backline playing some serious "herd ball" right now. TON of space out on the wings after two passes inside. #SportingKC #SKCvTOR

timelineItems.name: Connor Johnson
timelineItems.text: Good stuff. #sportingkansascity #sportingkc #skc #mls #kronic

timelineItems.name: Armen Bedakian
timelineItems.text: So Steven Caldwell pairs up with Nick Hagglund once again, Bradley Orr in midfield. Perhaps out wide, or Bekker on the wing. #TFC #MLS

timelineItems.name: Isaac Knopf
timelineItems.text: Not a bad view! #SKCvTOR http://t.co/6SFHwci3To

timelineItems.name: Isaac Knopf
timelineItems.text: Not a bad view! #SKCvTOR http://t.co/6SFHwci3To

timelineItems.name: Sporting Kansas City
timelineItems.text: #SportingKC XI vs @torontofc: Kronberg; Juliao, Myers, Ellis, Sinovic; Feilhaber, Martinez, Nagamura (C); Dovale, Dwyer, Peterson #SKCvTOR

timelineItems.name: Sporting Kansas City
timelineItems.text: #SportingKC available subs vs. @torontofc: Gruenebaum, Munoz, Medranda, Zizzo, Saad, Sapong, Bieler #SKCvTOR

timelineItems.name: SKC Gameday
timelineItems.text: 19-year-old Igor Juliao makes his third career start at right back, with Sinovic on the other side of the defense. #SKCvTOR

timelineItems.name: SKC Gameday
timelineItems.text: Alex Martinez makes his first ever start for @SportingKC. Nagamura and Feilhaber accompany him in the midfield. #SKCvTOR

timelineItems.name: SKC Gameday
timelineItems.text: With players injured and on international duty, fullbacks Chance Myers and Kevin Ellis form SKC’s central defense partnership. #SKCvTOR

timelineItems.name: stephanieruch
timelineItems.text: #gametime #sportingkc #skcnation

timelineItems.name: Joseph Shaw
timelineItems.text: My view tonight! Let's go @TorontoFC! #TFC

timelineItems.name: SKC Gameday
timelineItems.text: #SportingKC is 10-4-4 all time vs. Toronto FC, 7-1-1 at home and a perfect 4-0-0 @SportingPark. #SKCvTOR

timelineItems.name: Brannon Oesterle
timelineItems.text: Sporting KC vs Toronto FC #SKC

timelineItems.comment: Foul by Benny Feilhaber (Sporting Kansas City).
Jermain Defoe (Toronto FC) wins a free kick in the attacking half.

timelineItems.name: OptaJack
timelineItems.text: 6 - @SportingKC have won 6 of their last 7 @MLS meetings with Toronto, and have won their last 5 home matches vs TOR. Trucking. #SKCvTOR

timelineItems.name: Jack Parker Sides
timelineItems.text: Great way to start my summer! #Sporting #SKC

timelineItems.name: Billy DT Greenwood
timelineItems.text: Happy to see my favorite @SportingKC player @ampC2 at the #SKCvTOR game http://t.co/8gs8cY7NvD

timelineItems.name: Billy DT Greenwood
timelineItems.text: Happy to see my favorite @SportingKC player @ampC2 at the #SKCvTOR game http://t.co/8gs8cY7NvD

timelineItems.comment: Attempt blocked. Kyle Bekker (Toronto FC) right footed shot from outside the box is blocked.

timelineItems.name: Jacob B.
timelineItems.text: I'm always surprised by how little PT Soony Saad gets with KC. Always seems pretty dangerous when he's on. #SKCvTOR

timelineItems.comment: Bradley Orr (Toronto FC) wins a free kick in the attacking half.
Foul by Alex Martinez (Sporting Kansas City).

timelineItems.name: OptaJack
timelineItems.text: 2 - Toronto have been issued a red card in each of their last 2 @MLS meetings with SKC. Disadvantaged. #SKCvTOR

timelineItems.name: SKC Gameday
timelineItems.text: Only one player in #SportingKC history (Eddie Johnson, nine) has scored more goals through 11 league games than Dom Dwyer (eight). #SKCvTOR

timelineItems.text: We're about 15 minute to kick. #SKCvTOR is the Stream of the Week: http://t.co/KLdPpSr5g1 http://t.co/RPthRwmB8q

timelineItems.text: #skc

timelineItems.name: OptaJack
timelineItems.text: 7 - There have been 7 red cards issued combined in #SKC’s last 8 @MLS games. Battles. #SKCvTOR

timelineItems.text: new seats for today #SKCvTOR http://t.co/mrFd95YKPw

timelineItems.name: Mikaela Glaubitz
timelineItems.text: new seats for today #SKCvTOR http://t.co/mrFd95YKPw

timelineItems.name: SKC Gameday
timelineItems.text: Tonight marks the first time Chance Myers has played center back since his international Generation Adidas Tour in 2009. #SKCvTOR

timelineItems.name: Jaclyn
timelineItems.text: A nice evening after all for tonight's match #SKCvTOR #IBelieveThatWeWillWin @sportingkc

timelineItems.name: SKC Gameday
timelineItems.text: Tonight also marks the first time Benny Feilhaber will play holding midfielder since he was with Hamburger SV (Germany) in 2006-07. #SKCvTOR

timelineItems.name: Marissa Ortiz
timelineItems.text: Sporting!!!! #skc #sportingkc

timelineItems.name: ALLIE
timelineItems.text: Mini Fan � #SKCNation @sportingkc

timelineItems.name: Charlie Snell
timelineItems.text: Here at the game #SKCvTOR http://t.co/hT9hpkHD9T

timelineItems.name: Charlie Snell
timelineItems.text: Here at the game #SKCvTOR http://t.co/hT9hpkHD9T

timelineItems.name: Andy Edwards
timelineItems.text: Feilhaber really is starting deep in the midfield. We'll see how long he can control himself and stay there... #SportingKC #SKCvTOR

timelineItems.comment: Match ends, Sporting Kansas City 2, Toronto FC 2.

timelineItems.name: Andy Edwards
timelineItems.text: Peter Vermes has to start at CB next week, right? #SportingKC #SKCvTOR

timelineItems.name: Henry
timelineItems.text: FINAL: Toronto FC steal a point here, much more than they deserve, Sporting KC slip up late. #TFCLive #SKCvTOR #TFC

timelineItems.name: Robert Grabe
timelineItems.text: Well, that was fun. #SKCvTOR

timelineItems.name: Mauricio Gómez
timelineItems.text: Lack of mental strength wen it counts most. Good for Dwyer, in great form. Disappointing result. This tie has the taste of a loss. #SKCvTOR

timelineItems.desc: An intriguing matchup of Eastern Conference sides kicks off the MLS weekend as Sporting Kansas City play host to Toronto FC on Friday evening at Sporting Park.
timelineItems.title: HIGHLIGHTS: Sporting KC vs Toronto FC | May 23, 2014

timelineItems.text: Go Sporting! #skc #mls #kc #ibelievethatwewillwin

timelineItems.comment: Corner,  Toronto FC. Conceded by Chance Myers.

timelineItems.name: Ben
timelineItems.text: This is sloppy. I don't know how much more I can watch before I change the channel for a bit #SKCvTOR

timelineItems.name: Jackson Riley
timelineItems.text: Sporting game #skc #bluehell

timelineItems.comment: Foul by Justin Morrow (Toronto FC).
Benny Feilhaber (Sporting Kansas City) wins a free kick in the defensive half.

timelineItems.name: ☀MichaelG☀️
timelineItems.text: From far away Bekker's blonde hair looks the same as Bradley's bald head haha #SKCvTOR #TFClive

timelineItems.comment: Lineups are announced and players are warming up.

timelineItems.name: Ron Waxman
timelineItems.text: FIVE starters missing from tonight's game due to WC call ups! Yet fans are expected to pay full price & game is worth 3 points #MLS #SKCvTOR

timelineItems.comment: Delay in match Igor Julião (Sporting Kansas City) because of an injury.

timelineItems.name: Andy Edwards
timelineItems.text: Juliao's gonna have to be subbed off shortly, it looks. Zizzo with his jersey on, warming up hastily. #SportingKC #SKCvTOR

timelineItems.comment: Delay over. They are ready to continue.
Foul by Steven Caldwell (Toronto FC).
Dominic Dwyer (Sporting Kansas City) wins a free kick on the left wing.

timelineItems.name: Survival Letterpress
timelineItems.text: #believe #skc

timelineItems.name: Casey Wieder
timelineItems.text: So many men forward. The counterattack will be there for TFC the whole night. #SKCvTOR

timelineItems.name: SKC Gameday
timelineItems.text: 29' Sigh of relief as Juliao walks off the field. Looks like he'll reenter the match imminently. 0-0 #SKCvTOR

timelineItems.name: Ryan
timelineItems.text: #sportinng##followforfollow#likefolike

timelineItems.comment: Foul by Gilberto (Toronto FC).
Kevin Ellis (Sporting Kansas City) wins a free kick on the left wing.

timelineItems.name: Kristi Colvin
timelineItems.text: Oh gosh oh gosh. Terrible our new Igor is hurling on the pitch. I don't know what went wrong. #sportingkc #skc #mls

timelineItems.name: bdewade
timelineItems.text: Sporting KC Game.. #skc #mls

timelineItems.comment: Foul by Kyle Bekker (Toronto FC).
Paulo Nagamura (Sporting Kansas City) wins a free kick in the defensive half.

timelineItems.desc: Foul by Jermain Defoe (Toronto FC) on Chance Myers (Sporting KC)
timelineItems.title: INJURY: Chance Myers ankle forces another SKC defensive change

timelineItems.name: Andy McLeod
timelineItems.text: Igor just went all Steamin Willie Beaman all over the pitch. @SportingKC is about to run up the score. #SKCvTOR

timelineItems.comment: Foul by Jermain Defoe (Toronto FC).
Chance Myers (Sporting Kansas City) wins a free kick in the defensive half.
Delay in match Chance Myers (Sporting Kansas City) because of an injury.

timelineItems.name: Andy Edwards
timelineItems.text: So to recap… Of the 4 healthy defenders available on #SportingKC's entire roster, 1 has now puked on the field tonight. #SKCvTOR

timelineItems.name: Andy Edwards
timelineItems.text: And now Chance Myers, 1 of the 4, is down and looking in a bad way. Who's the… uh… 8th center back on the roster? #SportingKC #SKCvTOR

timelineItems.comment: Delay over. They are ready to continue.

timelineItems.name: Andy Edwards
timelineItems.text: Myers was helped off, is sitting on the bench and being looked at by two trainers. Zizzo is gonna check in. #SportingKC #SKCvTOR

timelineItems.name: Steve Brisendine
timelineItems.text: Myers being helped off. Victor Munoz subbing in for MLS debut. Seriously, PV must have stolen that jinxed tiki from "The Brady Bunch."

timelineItems.name: Andy Edwards
timelineItems.text: Benny Feilhaber's going to finish this game at center back. #SportingKC #SKCvTOR

timelineItems.comment: Hand ball by Álvaro Rey (Toronto FC).

timelineItems.name: K Ostrovsky
timelineItems.text: Any minute, Vermes is going to rip his suit off to reveal a kit and go in at CB himself. #SKCvTOR

timelineItems.desc: Gilberto (Toronto FC) is shown the yellow card for a bad foul.
timelineItems.title: YELLOW CARD: Gilberto pulls down Feilhaber for a caution

timelineItems.comment: Igor Julião (Sporting Kansas City) wins a free kick on the right wing.
Foul by Justin Morrow (Toronto FC).

timelineItems.name: Andy Edwards
timelineItems.text: Everybody wants Gruenebaum to play center back. Why not? #SportingKC #SKCvTOR

timelineItems.comment: Foul by Gilberto (Toronto FC).
Benny Feilhaber (Sporting Kansas City) wins a free kick in the defensive half.
Attempt missed. Dominic Dwyer (Sporting Kansas City) left footed shot from outside the box misses to the left. Assisted by Benny Feilhaber from a direct free kick.
Attempt blocked. Toni (Sporting Kansas City) left footed shot from the centre of the box is blocked. Assisted by Jacob Peterson.
Offside, Sporting Kansas City. Dominic Dwyer tries a through ball, but Jacob Peterson is caught offside.

timelineItems.name: Nate Brinson
timelineItems.text: Feilhaber isn't a natural 6, but playing with such a makeshift backline is going to make it hard on anyone. #SportingKC #SKCvTOR

timelineItems.name: Steve Brisendine
timelineItems.text: Sporting now have no field players over 6 feet tall on the pitch.

timelineItems.comment: Jermain Defoe (Toronto FC) wins a free kick in the defensive half.
Foul by Seth Sinovic (Sporting Kansas City).

timelineItems.name: ☀MichaelG☀️
timelineItems.text: Morrow got stuck and was forced to foul haha #SKCvTOR #TFClive

timelineItems.comment: Foul by Seth Sinovic (Sporting Kansas City).
Gilberto (Toronto FC) wins a free kick in the attacking half.

timelineItems.name: Sawyer Pangborn
timelineItems.text: At this rate, #SKC might have to bring back Nielsen as a defender. #SKCvTOR

timelineItems.comment: Offside, Toronto FC. Kyle Bekker tries a through ball, but Steven Caldwell is caught offside.

timelineItems.name: Andy Edwards
timelineItems.text: I don't know who's playing where. I don't think the players know either. #SportingKC #SKCvTOR

timelineItems.name: The Full 90
timelineItems.text: So, everyone's pretty glad Feilhaber didn't get called up now. Right? #SKCvTOR

timelineItems.name: Doran Stucky
timelineItems.text: I have never seen a team's defense stretched THIS thin... #SportingKC #SKCvTOR #MLS

timelineItems.comment: Foul by Collen Warner (Toronto FC).
Paulo Nagamura (Sporting Kansas City) wins a free kick in the attacking half.

timelineItems.name: Andy Edwards
timelineItems.text: Chance Myers: "unspecified ankle injury." #SportingKC #SKCvTOR http://t.co/jIeoV3ujIr

timelineItems.comment: Offside, Toronto FC. Jermain Defoe tries a through ball, but Gilberto is caught offside.

timelineItems.name: SKC Gameday
timelineItems.text: 44' Defoe breaks forward on a Toronto counter attack and slides a through ball to Gilberto, who is flagged offside. 0-0 #SKCvTOR

timelineItems.comment: Foul by Kevin Ellis (Sporting Kansas City).
Jermain Defoe (Toronto FC) wins a free kick in the attacking half.

timelineItems.name: W. Knutt Megg Esq.
timelineItems.text: Look at the bright side, Sporting Kansas City fans. At least you have more defenders than the #USMNT has Landon Donovans. #SKCvTOR

timelineItems.comment: Attempt blocked. Mark Bloom (Toronto FC) left footed shot from outside the box is blocked.
Attempt saved. Justin Morrow (Toronto FC) left footed shot from long range on the left is saved in the top right corner. Assisted by Collen Warner.

timelineItems.name: Steve Brisendine
timelineItems.text: I would have ranked the odds of a scoreless first half lower than "Jake Busey Oscar nod" but slightly above "@b_feilhaber22, Center Back."

timelineItems.name: Andy Edwards
timelineItems.text: The ball hasn't rolled through the puke yet, but it has bounced over it. Because you were wondering. #SportingKC #SKCvTOR

timelineItems.comment: Foul by Bradley Orr (Toronto FC).
Alex Martinez (Sporting Kansas City) wins a free kick in the defensive half.

timelineItems.name: Timbers Rumors
timelineItems.text: Wow this has turned into an ugly game. #SKCvTOR

timelineItems.name: SKC Gameday
timelineItems.text: HALFTIME. @SportingKC 0, @torontofc 0. Chance Myers exits injured in the 36th minute, testing the home side's depth even further. #SKCvTOR

timelineItems.comment: First Half ends, Sporting Kansas City 0, Toronto FC 0.

timelineItems.name: Joe Tansey
timelineItems.text: All we talked about during that half was puke on the field and injuries. That shows how much happened in 45 minutes. #SKCvTOR

timelineItems.text: I think Gilberto is trying to ruin @KurtLarSUN's life. #SKCvTOR

timelineItems.text: . @SportingKC's backline can't catch a break: http://t.co/UycX8bnZEq #SKCvTOR

timelineItems.text: Darkest timeline indeed. @KCCauldron #SKCvTOR

timelineItems.text: Just a simple #skc game

timelineItems.name: Casey Wieder
timelineItems.text: Remember when we praised Vermes for letting Gardner and Jerome go....#SKCvTOR

timelineItems.name: Jesus Frausto
timelineItems.text: Enjoying my Friday night #soccer #mls #sportingkc #skc #futbol #kcmo #dwyer #champs #tgif #nofilter #usa @sportingkc

timelineItems.comment: Second Half begins Sporting Kansas City 0, Toronto FC 0.

timelineItems.name: dnommahwerd
timelineItems.text: Sup halftime? #sportingkc #skc #smashtoronto

timelineItems.comment: Attempt blocked. Paulo Nagamura (Sporting Kansas City) right footed shot from outside the box is blocked.

timelineItems.name: Steve Brisendine
timelineItems.text: Peterson at left back to begin the second half. Ellis and Sinovic in the middle. Igor Juliao still at right yack.

timelineItems.name: SKC Gameday
timelineItems.text: The second half commences with the home side attacking the @KCCauldron end. 0-0 #SKCvTOR

timelineItems.name: SKC Gameday
timelineItems.text: 47' DWYER STRIKES AGAIN! @SportingKC GO IN FRONT!!! #SKCvTOR

timelineItems.name: Andy Edwards
timelineItems.text: Boom. Called it. Somehow, the first goal of the game goes to #SportingKC. A totally lifeless #TFC. #SKCvTOR

timelineItems.name: Andy Edwards
timelineItems.text: Dom Dwyer is now tied with Bradley Wright-Phillips (9 goals) in the 2014 @MLS Golden Boot race. #SportingKC #SKCvTOR

timelineItems.comment: Foul by Jacob Peterson (Sporting Kansas City).
Álvaro Rey (Toronto FC) wins a free kick in the defensive half.

timelineItems.name: Joe Tansey
timelineItems.text: Who needs defenders when you have Dom Dwyer? #SKCvTOR

timelineItems.comment: Attempt missed. Gilberto (Toronto FC) right footed shot from outside the box is high and wide to the right. Assisted by Álvaro Rey.

timelineItems.name: juliedumovich
timelineItems.text: Jimmy and I are both visiting our former office tonight. ☺️ Go Sporting! #SKC #SportingKC

timelineItems.name: Andrew Clifton
timelineItems.text: In college I had to move to cb from rb in an emergency situation. I felt totally lost. Tough ask for Myers/Ellis. #SKCvTOR

timelineItems.name: Major League Soccer
timelineItems.text: . @SportingKC lead 1-0 courtesy of @Ddwyer14. Good movement to find space at the top of the box. #SKCvTOR

timelineItems.desc: Dan Haiek and Armchair Analyst Matt Doyle preview the Friday night match between Sporting KC and Toronto FC. Will Sporting feature two fullbacks in the middle of defense? Find out Friday at 830pm ET on MLS Live.
timelineItems.title: Sporting KC vs. Toronto FC May 23, 2014 Preview | Scouting Report

timelineItems.comment: Foul by Sal Zizzo (Sporting Kansas City).
Álvaro Rey (Toronto FC) wins a free kick in the defensive half.

timelineItems.name: Armen Bedakian
timelineItems.text: Reactionary soccer. No initiative. Deserved goal conceded for this lackluster Toronto FC.

timelineItems.name: Henry
timelineItems.text: Toronto just look so awkward in possession, not comfortable at all. Been this way all season, not fun to watch. #TFCLive #SKCvTOR #TFC

timelineItems.name: Andy Edwards
timelineItems.text: If #SportingKC win this game tonight, no KC fan in attendance or watching on TV will ever forget it. #SKCvTOR

timelineItems.name: Kristi Colvin
timelineItems.text: Somewhere over the rainbow, Sporting scores. � #justsayin #skc #sportingkc 1-0

timelineItems.name: Rahul Vaidyanath
timelineItems.text: glad to see Lovitz getting another appearance - was very active vs. #RBNY last week, getting stuck in #TFC #SKCvTOR #MLS

timelineItems.comment: Attempt missed. Alex Martinez (Sporting Kansas City) right footed shot from the left side of the box misses to the right. Assisted by Sal Zizzo.

timelineItems.name: Marissa Ortiz
timelineItems.text: Sporting KC GOAL!!!!! #goal #skc #sportingkc #1-0

timelineItems.name: Steve Brisendine
timelineItems.text: So if you're less organized than the team whose lineup reads "Yeah, whatever" ...

timelineItems.name: Armen Bedakian
timelineItems.text: At some point, Gilberto not scoring can't be brushed off as a non-issue.

timelineItems.comment: Attempt blocked. Igor Julião (Sporting Kansas City) right footed shot from outside the box is blocked.

timelineItems.name: Daniel Ronald Moreno
timelineItems.text: Alex Martinez is making a good impression tonight showing technique, leadership and experience. Great future for the Uruguayan. #SKCvTOR

timelineItems.title: RED CARD: Steven Caldwell goes studs high and sees red

timelineItems.comment: Attempt missed. Jacob Peterson (Sporting Kansas City) header from the centre of the box misses to the right. Assisted by Paulo Nagamura with a cross following a corner.

timelineItems.name: SKC Gameday
timelineItems.text: 62' Dovale's corner is punched away, and Nagamura's wicked volley outside the box is saved by Bendik! 1-0 #SKCvTOR

timelineItems.comment: Toni (Sporting Kansas City) wins a free kick in the attacking half.
Foul by Steven Caldwell (Toronto FC).

timelineItems.name: Armen Bedakian
timelineItems.text: Toronto FC has lost their mind.

timelineItems.name: Matthew Doyle
timelineItems.text: What's Caldwell arguing about? He just circumcised Dovale with his cleats. #SKCvTOR

timelineItems.desc: Goal!  Sporting Kansas City 1, Toronto FC 1. Luke Moore (Toronto FC) left footed shot from the center of the box to the bottom left corner. Assisted by Jermain Defoe.
timelineItems.title: GOAL: Luke Moore brings 10-man Toronto level

timelineItems.name: Rahul Vaidyanath
timelineItems.text: yeah, gotta send off Caldwell for that one - reminds me of De Jong on Alonso in 2010 World Cup although not nearly as brutal #SKCvTOR #MLS

timelineItems.name: Andy Edwards
timelineItems.text: (I almost just tweeted "I bet #TFC come alive now.) #SportingKC #SKCvTOR

timelineItems.name: Sporting Kansas City
timelineItems.text: Goal Toronto. We're now level 1-1 in the 67th minute. #SKCvTOR

timelineItems.name: Kristi Colvin
timelineItems.text: Well well well. Someone has been heinous and has been ejected. Toronto is down to 10 and with us at our most creative field arrangement EVER. #doublerainbow don't lie people!!! #ibelieve #sportingkc #skc  That said..... Toronto just got one in. 1-1 67th minute

timelineItems.name: dex
timelineItems.text: Feels amazing to be back at @SportingPark #SportingKC #SKCvTOR http://t.co/An5GG6qmgk

timelineItems.name: dex
timelineItems.text: Feels amazing to be back at @SportingPark #SportingKC #SKCvTOR http://t.co/An5GG6qmgk

timelineItems.name: The MLS Czar
timelineItems.text: And that's the stuff Defoe can set up. Too dangerous, good finish by Moore too. #SKCvTOR

timelineItems.comment: Foul by Nick Hagglund (Toronto FC).
Dominic Dwyer (Sporting Kansas City) wins a free kick in the attacking half.

timelineItems.name: Andy Edwards
timelineItems.text: I know it's nitpicking but someone (probably Feilhaber, admittedly not a d-mid) has to take a foul & yellow card there. #SportingKC #SKCvTOR

timelineItems.comment: Attempt missed. Dominic Dwyer (Sporting Kansas City) header from the centre of the box is just a bit too high. Assisted by Benny Feilhaber following a set piece situation.

timelineItems.name: Sporting Kansas City
timelineItems.text: GOAL!!! @ddwyer14 scores his ninth of the season in the 47th minute! #SKCvTOR

timelineItems.name: Casey Wieder
timelineItems.text: Promising movement by Sporting to start the game. Juliao and Dovale are all over the field. #SKCvTOR

timelineItems.comment: Foul by Luke Moore (Toronto FC).
Alex Martinez (Sporting Kansas City) wins a free kick in the defensive half.

timelineItems.name: Monica Nguyen
timelineItems.text: Gooooooaaaaal by @ddwyer14! #goSportingKC #SKC #kc #soccerhotties #iseeyouboo #soccer #fútbol

timelineItems.name: Elizabeth Starr
timelineItems.text: No place I'd rather be. Let's go #SKC

timelineItems.name: Armen Bedakian
timelineItems.text: Luke Moore has done more in two days than Gilberto has done in 10.

timelineItems.comment: Attempt saved. Toni (Sporting Kansas City) left footed shot from outside the box is saved in the centre of the goal. Assisted by Paulo Nagamura.

timelineItems.name: Jon Townsend
timelineItems.text: In 3 mins of #MLS soccer I have seen Dwyer attempt to control the ball twice with his shins. Nope, make that three times. #SKCvTOR

timelineItems.name: biag
timelineItems.text: Great play by Moore keeping the ball in play #TSN #SKCvTOR #tfclive

timelineItems.comment: Attempt blocked. Alex Martinez (Sporting Kansas City) right footed shot from outside the box is blocked. Assisted by Benny Feilhaber.

timelineItems.name: Henry
timelineItems.text: TFC might have gotten lucky there, i've seen penalties given for much, much less. #TFCLive #SKCvTOR

timelineItems.comment: Attempt missed. Toni (Sporting Kansas City) left footed shot from outside the box is too high. Assisted by Alex Martinez.

timelineItems.name: Garrett Haake
timelineItems.text: I can see these players. It's neat. #SKC

timelineItems.name: Andy Edwards
timelineItems.text: If #SportingKC had shown even HALF the effort or desire they have tonight, last Wed. vs. PHI, they'd have won that game 3-0. #SKCvTOR

timelineItems.comment: Bradley Orr (Toronto FC) wins a free kick in the defensive half.
Foul by Alex Martinez (Sporting Kansas City).

timelineItems.desc: Paulo Nagamura (Sporting Kansas City) is shown the yellow card for a bad foul.
timelineItems.title: YELLOW CARD: Paulo Nagamura booked for a pull down

timelineItems.comment: Foul by Paulo Nagamura (Sporting Kansas City).
Justin Morrow (Toronto FC) wins a free kick in the defensive half.
Kevin Ellis (Sporting Kansas City) wins a free kick in the defensive half.
Foul by Jermain Defoe (Toronto FC).

timelineItems.name: Cass
timelineItems.text: Pan the camera back to Vermes, por favor; the Slomka-esque furrow has returned, and it's worthy of airtime. Can't blame him either. #SKCvTOR

timelineItems.comment: Corner,  Toronto FC. Conceded by Benny Feilhaber.

timelineItems.name: Henry
timelineItems.text: Poor ball in, low and goes out for a goal kick. Not really taking advantage of the few chances Toronto. #TFClive #SKCvTOR

timelineItems.comment: Offside, Toronto FC. Joe Bendik tries a through ball, but Jermain Defoe is caught offside.
Attempt saved. Paulo Nagamura (Sporting Kansas City) right footed shot from the centre of the box is saved in the centre of the goal. Assisted by Dominic Dwyer.

timelineItems.name: Major League Soccer
timelineItems.text: HIGHLIGHT: SKC gives the ball away cheaply at midfield & Luke Moore brings 10-man @TorontoFC level: http://t.co/H7SjJgKE96 #SKCvTOR #TFCLive

timelineItems.desc: Luke Moore (Toronto FC) is shown the yellow card.
timelineItems.title: PENALTY: Doneil Henry flattens Juliao in the box

timelineItems.comment: Penalty conceded by Doneil Henry (Toronto FC) after a foul in the penalty area.
Penalty Sporting Kansas City. Igor Julião draws a foul in the penalty area.

timelineItems.desc: Goal!  Sporting Kansas City 2, Toronto FC 1. Dominic Dwyer (Sporting Kansas City) converts the penalty with a left footed shot to the bottom left
timelineItems.title: PK GOAL: Dom Dwyer places a perfect penalty for the lead

timelineItems.name: Steve Brisendine
timelineItems.text: PENAL PENAL PENAL PENAL ...Wonder who's going to take it. Was @Ddwyer14 a prophet on Tuesday?

timelineItems.name: Andy Edwards
timelineItems.text: 2-1 #SportingKC, and you can't say they don't deserve every last bit of it. #SKCvTOR

timelineItems.name: Armen Bedakian
timelineItems.text: Doneil Henry concedes ANOTHER penalty. Third one in a row. Unacceptable. Unacceptable.

timelineItems.name: Joe Tansey
timelineItems.text: Hey Doneil Henry, you can't do that. #SKCvTOR

timelineItems.name: Kristi Colvin
timelineItems.text: Big man coming in FTW!! Yay CJ!!!! And Dom.... Well all I can say is DOUBLE EFFIN RAINBOW BATCHES!!!!!!!!!! 2-1 #skc #sportingkc #doublerainbow

timelineItems.name: Major League Soccer
timelineItems.text: . @Ddwyer14 has 10 goals in MLS this season. No one has more. #SKCvTOR

timelineItems.comment: Collen Warner (Toronto FC) wins a free kick in the defensive half.
Foul by Paulo Nagamura (Sporting Kansas City).

timelineItems.name: Sean Hamel
timelineItems.text: Dom Dwyer with the huge goal. @Ddwyer14 will now certainly get Jermaine Defoe's Jersey post-game! #SKCvTOR

timelineItems.name: Tiffany M Cross
timelineItems.text: 2-1 #SKC #ibelievethatwewillwin #suckitcanada

timelineItems.comment: Corner,  Sporting Kansas City. Conceded by Mark Bloom.

timelineItems.name: sejones8
timelineItems.text: friday night lights #skc #ibelieve [this one's for you @jchickpt14 ]

timelineItems.name: Robert Grabe
timelineItems.text: What exactly is Dom Dwyer's shirt made of? #SKCvTOR

timelineItems.comment: Collen Warner (Toronto FC) wins a free kick in the attacking half.
Foul by Benny Feilhaber (Sporting Kansas City).

timelineItems.name: Charles Boehm
timelineItems.text: Born in Colombia but repping Chicagoland: Diego Gutierrez has one heck of an Illinois accent. I can almost taste the Old Style. #SKCvTOR

timelineItems.desc: Goal!  Sporting Kansas City 2, Toronto FC 2. Bradley Orr (Toronto FC) header from the center of the box to the top right corner.
timelineItems.title: GOAL: Bradley Orr stuns the home crowd to equalize late

timelineItems.name: Andy Edwards
timelineItems.text: Weird game. #SportingKC #SKCvTOR

timelineItems.name: Rahul Vaidyanath
timelineItems.text: Doneil Henry owes Bradley Orr a case of _____ #SKCvTOR 2-2 #TFC #SKC

timelineItems.comment: Collen Warner (Toronto FC) wins a free kick in the defensive half.
Foul by C.J. Sapong (Sporting Kansas City).

timelineItems.name: Nate Sulat
timelineItems.text: Ball don't lie... Is that how you use that expression? #SKCvTOR

timelineItems.name: Major League Soccer
timelineItems.text: Bradley Orr brings 10-man @TorontoFC level. 2-2 with just minutes left. #SKCvTOR

timelineItems.comment: Attempt missed. Jacob Peterson (Sporting Kansas City) right footed shot from outside the box is too high. Assisted by Jimmy Medranda.
Foul by Luke Moore (Toronto FC).
Benny Feilhaber (Sporting Kansas City) wins a free kick in the attacking half.

timelineItems.name: Dan Mayer
timelineItems.text: This game has been pretty "meh" but the goals have been pretty good. Not goal of the week worthy but nice. #SKCvTOR

timelineItems.name: layla
timelineItems.text: Hi, welcome to my new job ⚽️� #skc #bluehell

timelineItems.comment: Foul by Jimmy Medranda (Sporting Kansas City).
Daniel Lovitz (Toronto FC) wins a free kick on the left wing.

timelineItems.name: Matt Jacobson
timelineItems.text: That last goal allowed really showed how much we're missing our CBs. #SKCvTOR

timelineItems.name: Lindsey Heeter
timelineItems.text: I believe that we just won #skc #kansascity #nofilter

timelineItems.comment: Second Half ends, Sporting Kansas City 2, Toronto FC 2.
